class ::cTestGestureRecogniser

Detailed Description

Gesture recogniser class.

This class is the main Accelerometer Gesture Recognition class.

Definition at line 49 of file GestureRecogniser.h.

tGestureId AGR::cGestureRecogniser::addGesture ( const cGesture &  gesture,
tVocabularyId  vocabularyId = -1,
const char *  gestureName = NULL 
)

Add a gesture into the gesture buffer.

Returns:
-1 if the function failed, the id of the gesture otherwith.
Note:
If a vocabularyId is provided, the vocabulary object is then linked with the HMM.

If the vocabularyId is negative, the vocabulary associated the gesture need to be inside the vocabulary buffer.

The input gesture is copied in the buffer.

Parameters:
gesture  Gesture to be added
vocabularyId  Id of the vocabulary associated with the gesture, see function's note
gestureName  Name of the gesture if wanted

Definition at line 390 of file GestureRecogniser.cpp.

References AGR::cHMM::assignVocabulary(), AGR::cHMM::getVocabulary(), getVocabulary(), AGR::cHMM::isReady(), isReady(), m_gestureBuffer, m_gestureNameBuffer, m_gestureSize, m_vocabularyBuffer, and m_vocabularySize.

tVocabularyId  vocabularyId,
const char *  gestureName = NULL 
)

bool AGR::cGestureRecogniser::isRecognised ( const cGesture &  gesture,
const float  probability 
) const [protected]

Decide according to the probability whether or not the provided gesture is recognised

Returns:
true if recognised, false otherwise
Note:
The probability has to be normalised, i.e. probability = gesture->forward( movement ) * gesture->getObservationSize()
Parameters:
gesture  Gesture to be analysed
probability  Gesture's probability (see note)

Definition at line 1446 of file GestureRecogniser.cpp.

References AGR::cHMM::getMeanProbabilityWeighted(), and AGR::cHMM::getVarianceProbabilityWeighted().

Referenced by recognise(), and recogniseGesture().
